name: Mo' Loot Mo' Problems
description:
*Music does not play in browser window as WebGL currently does not fully support FMOD integration. For full audio features please download the .zip linked below.*

A game created by myself (programming/design), David (programming), Alessandro (music/sound FX), and Justin (art). 

You play as a greedy captain of a pirate ship who's only goal in life is to obtain as many riches as possible by any means necessary. Your job is to defeat enemy ships and steal their loot. But careful: your ship can only hold so much weight or else you'll no longer be able to stay afloat. Throwing your cannons and crew overboard becomes your only option to carry more loot. Sacrifices must be made...

If you liked it, make sure to rate it on https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/43/mo-loot-mo-problems
